resources.string: GSE Red is Free Fund Raising Platform for Charity/Cause through shopping without paying any extra penny. Access all 370+ apps in just less than 11MB. We have partnered with Flipkart, Amazon, Swiggy, Make my Trip and more than 370+ companies and connected with more than 50+ charities in India. We make raising funds for charities easy and fun just by shopping online with our leading partners. Shopping and raising funds for charities has never been made this easier.
